'Hybrid' (real name 'Scott Washington') is a fictional anti-hero of the Marvel
Universe. Scott Washington first appeared in The New Warriors #21 (March 1992)
by writer Fabian Nicieza and penciller Mark Bagley. The symbiote first appeared
in the back-up stories in the Venom: Along Came A Spider (1996) miniseries by
writer Evan Skolnick and penciller Patrick Zircher.
categories: Marvel Comics characters with superhuman strength
